clients.title: We Hosted Our “Just Meet Up!” Event
description: We held our first "Just meet up!" event for this year, a bimonthly event where students get together with our engineers to learn about various topics in technology from programming to SEO. Mayra, our Director of Engineering, spoke about Machine Learning and the students took advantage of the opportunity to exchange ideas with our group of experienced engineers.
